item.title: Algorand to Be Integrated With Wormhole
item.description: Algorand confirmed the integration of Wormhole’s Native Token Transfers (NTT) into its blockchain on July 1st, following development by Folks Finance in cooperation with the Algorand Foundation.The implementation enables cross-chain token movement, with the FOLKS token designated as the first asset…
